plot outline: Abu is passionate about the popular Mangalurean art form of Yakshagana, much against the wishes and rules of his community. Despite the prejudices, he saves up money through Yakshagana in order to send his mother on her Haj pilgrimage to Mecca.
title: Banna Bannada Baduku
plot: Abu is a renowned Yakashagana artiste in Mangaluru. He faces a crisis because of his religion, both on his personal and professional front. How does he overcome it?

Abu is passionate about the popular Mangalurean art form of Yakshagana, much against the wishes and rules of his community. Despite the prejudices, he saves up money through Yakshagana in order to send his mother on her Haj pilgrimage to Mecca.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
